items.sentence: You're the only person I've ever seen who can tap dance while playing the banjo.
Tom said he wondered if Mary and I really would be able to do that by ourselves.
My life would probably have been quite different if I'd been born a month later.
Bees communicate the location of food by carrying odor samples back to the hive.
Mary knows that all she has to do is snap her fingers and Tom will come running.
I couldn't get a word in edgewise with Tom, and all he talked about was himself.
The fire that caused the disaster broke out on the second floor of the hospital.
If you want to make sure Tom understands you, you should speak to him in French.
Every butterfly was a caterpillar, but not all caterpillars will be butterflies.
I could've been finished doing that by 2:30 if Tom hadn't started talking to me.
